headline: CME Group Expands Crypto Derivatives With Spot-Quoted XRP and Solana Futures
summary: These are CME’s smallest crypto contracts to date, aimed at active participants who prefer to trade in spot market terms without managing contract expiries or rollovers.

raw.headline: CME Group Expands Crypto Derivatives With Spot-Quoted XRP and Solana Futures
raw.summary: These are CME’s smallest crypto contracts to date, aimed at active participants who prefer to trade in spot market terms without managing contract expiries or rollovers.

headline: CME Group to Launch Spot-Quoted XRP and SOL Futures
summary: CME Group, the world's leading derivatives marketplace, today launched Spot-Quoted XRP and SOL futures.

raw.headline: CME Group to Launch Spot-Quoted XRP and SOL Futures
raw.summary: CME Group, the world's leading derivatives marketplace, today launched Spot-Quoted XRP and SOL futures.
